        <th>Sample Output</th>
    </thead>
    <tbody valign="top">
        <td>2<br>1 2<br>3 4<br>RLR</td>
        <td>3 1<br>4 2</td>
    </tbody>
</table>
<p>Time Limit: 1<br>
Memory Limit: 256<br>
Source Limit:</p>
